title: Charles Dickens
description: Study of representative work by Charles Dickens. Critical approach designations: Canons, Histories. May be repeated for credit.
class_notes: Special Session: July 23-29, all day. From the Instructor: Class is taught as part of the the Dickens Universe https://dickens.ucsc.edu/universe/ , which will feature A Tale of Two Cities by Charles Dickens. A historical novel set in London and Paris at the time of the French Revolution, its plot involves many sensational and melodramatic elements: imprisonment in the Bastille and the bloody Reign of Terror; lost children and body doubles; heroism and sacrifice.
